column1: Kyowa Kirin sponsored The Management of Sezary Syndrome Educational Webinar held on 11 March, 2021. This event was organised by the Australiasian Lymphoma Alliance - Snowdome Foundation and Kyowa Kirin was not responsible for inviting the attendees or organising the 1 hour of educational content.
